attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Richie Benaud is one of the foremost cricketing personalities that has ever lived. Not only was he a phenomenal, world-class, test all-rounder, scoring over 2,000 runs and taking 248 wickets, including 248 catches, he is also a respected commentator on cricket.

Marvellous.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
